lead_paragraph: Russia will treat all unfounded allegations of doping against its sportspeople as slander, the RIA news agency quoted Kremlin spokesman Dmitry Peskov as saying on Wednesday.

headline.print_headline: Kremlin: We Will Treat All Unfounded Doping Allegations as Slander-RIA
headline.main: Kremlin: We Will Treat All Unfounded Doping Allegations as Slander-RIA

snippet: Russia will treat all unfounded allegations of doping against its sportspeople as slander, the RIA news agency quoted Kremlin spokesman Dmitry Peskov as saying on Wednesday....
